meanings.definition: A person who practices sorcery or magic.
meanings.sent1: The sorcerers in the story cast spells to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The villagers feared the sorcerers who lived in the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The sorcerers accidentally turned the prince into a frog during their magic practice.
meanings.sent4: The sorcerers' words seemed like spells, weaving a mysterious web around the castle.
meanings.sent5: The sorcerers' robes billowed as they summoned the ancient powers of the earth.

meanings.definition: One who is believed to have supernatural powers.
meanings.sent1: The old man was rumored to be a sorcerers with the ability to see the future.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of sorcerers who could control the elements with a wave of their hand.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled, pretending to be sorcerers with imaginary magical abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a sorcerers' gaze, captivating all who dared to meet her stare.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious sorcerers' presence filled the room with an otherworldly energy.
